Title: Runaway Brain
Genre: Animation, Short, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Tim Hauser (story based on an idea by)
Actors: Wayne Allwine, Russi Taylor, Kelsey Grammer, Jim Cummings
Plot: In an attempt to convince Minnie that he hasn't forgotten to buy her an anniversary present, Mickey Mouse ends up promising to take her to Hawaii. Funds being short, he applies for a job as lab assistant to the sinister Dr. Frankenollie, who happens to be searching for a donor to provide his monstrous creation with a brain...
